p.s: I heard that you think, that student exchanges are a waste of time.
And I can understand your opinion, but I want to tell you some arguments, why student exchanges may be not a waistewaste of time, and can even be an opportunity for a better future.
First of all, my opinion is that student exchanges are not a waistewaste of time, and that they are great experience.
I myself wouldn't consider to go abroad because I couldn't leave my family for that long, but if you go abroad great things can happen to you.
The most important thing is that you make new experiences, by seeing another culture, hearing a new language and meeting new people.
Making new experiences can be fun and maybe they help you in the future to find a better job, where they want people with experiences of another cultures.
Also something very important is, that student exchanges can make you more tolleranttolerant and accepting.
If more people would learn about another culture and not just hating them, there would be more less racism in the world.
And going abroad is a way to connect with each other and tolerate us we can change the future and make the world to a better place, not only for us but for the people that will come after us.
If we all connect, we would have such a great power that we could change the world.
But you have to remember with great power comes great responsibility.
And that is why we have to learn from each other, to have more tolerance in this world.
